item.title: Top 3 Defensive Stocks Which Could Rescue Your Portfolio In Q4
Why Hewlett Packard Enterprise Shares Are Plunging Thursday?
item.description: HPE shares fell after unveiling FY28 strategy targeting $3.5B free cash flow, 7% revenue CAGR, and strong AI and hybrid cloud growth. read more

item.title: Bitcoin Steadies Above $110,000 As Ethereum, XRP, Dogecoin Slip On Thursday
item.description: Bitcoin is holding steady around $110,000 despite $94 million in net outflows from spot BTC ETFs on Wednesday . read more

item.title: United Airlines Projects Best Quarter Ever, CEO Says Loyalty Boosted Resilience
item.description: United Airlines (NASDAQ: UAL) shares down premarket after reporting mixed Q3 results. Revenue rose but missed estimates, adjusted EPS beat. read more

item.title: Tesla Rival Nio Falls 7% In Pre-Market Trading Amid Singapore Wealth Fund Lawsuit Over Alleged Revenue Inflation
item.description: Nio shares fell 12% on concerns of a revenue lawsuit filed by Singaporean Wealth Fund GIC Pvt Ltd in New York Southern District Court. read more
